Subject: MAJOR INCIDENT RESOLVED: Network connectivity issue in HO2
--------------------------------------------------
      

 

MAJOR INCIDENT RESOLVED: Network connectivity issue in HO2

______________________________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________________________

Date: Tuesday 11 Oct, 2024
Time: 3.39 PM GST 

 Dear Colleagues,

We are pleased to inform you that the network connectivity issues affecting the Group WiFi in the HO2  office has now been resolved. Users should be able to connect to the Wi-Fi. 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cb0113636b01540daa2a808dce9c82829%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642293457088569%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8L2eGTzV2%2BwRV8ZV0Cu9GapYEWM8wI9yTk1dv2ULWKk%3D&reserved=0>
